properties.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 3:19PM PST until February 8 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 5 inches with locally up to 6 inches around Winchester.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, and Soldiers Meadow
Road.

* WHEN...From 2 AM to 7 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Expect difficult driving conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start overnight with the best
accumulations occurring in the afternoon and early evening
hours.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 7 PM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET
